description.p: Alovoa aims to be the first global open-source platform that enables people to easily find new friends and dates.
Alovoa is a platform of equality and without limits. No paid tiers, no like limit, no message limits, no bullshit. Only financed by your donations.
Alovoa is 100% open-source software. The source code for Alovoa, including the server code,is hosted on GitHub and everyone is free to review, audit, and contribute to the Alovoa codebase.
